title: Wrestling Regions: LIVE VIDEO, brackets, results and more from every tournament
body: Top photos from the NJSIAA Region Wrestling ChampionshipsWelcome to ’s coverage of the NJSIAA / Rothman Orthopaedics 2021 State Regional Wrestling Championships. We know this year will be unlike any other, with new tournament formats to accommodate the facility capacity limits due to the coronavirus. Fans will be able to watch the wrestling this year, for free, live on !We’ll have photos and write-ups from every location, as well as results and brackets, all linked below.📸 📸 📸 📸 View the round-by-round  (times are approximate)Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
